spell1.name: LIGHT & DARK ICE
spell1.description: Fire ice shots that damage enemies or heal allies.

attributes.label: FIRE RATE
attributes.value: 0.5s for three shots. The interval between the first two shots is 0.05s

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 60% at 40m

spell2.name: FATE OF BOTH WORLDS
spell2.description: Take center stage and start dancing! Press to toggle between two performances: Heal allies or grant them Damage Boost.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Persistent spell field that surrounds the caster

spell3.name: ICE ARTS
spell3.description: Fire ice shards for a short duration, damaging enemies or healing allies while restoring her own Health.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast spell field that pierces through enemies

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: A cylindrical spell field with a radius of 1m and a height of 40m

spell4.name: SHARE THE STAGE
spell4.description: Attach Idol Aura to an ally. Allies with Idol Aura also restore Health when Luna Snow is healing others.

spell5.name: ABSOLUTE ZERO
spell5.description: Cast a clump of ice to Freeze the hit enemy and restore Health.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Freezes target for 2.7s; attacking during the last 2.2s cancels freeze

spell6.name: CRYO HEART
spell6.description: Automatically restore Health when casting Ice Arts or Absolute Zero.

attributes.label: HEALING
attributes.value: 30/s for 3s (on casting Ice Arts or Absolute Zero)

spell7.name: SMOOTH SKATE
spell7.description: Keep moving forward to start ice skating and enable higher jumps

spell8.name: WINTER'S CHILL
spell8.description: With the blessing of Luna Snow, Hawkeye is imbued with the ice energy, allowing him to fire Ice Arrows that pierce through enemies! If an Ice Arrow travels beyond a certain distance, it Stuns any enemy it hits. If it strikes before reaching that distance, it instead Slows the target. The farther the Ice Arrow flies, the greater its damage

attributes.label: TEAM-UPS ACTIVE
attributes.value: Chilling Charisma (w/ Namor & Jeff), Atlas Bond (w/ Iron Fist)
